description: An automotive coil component that supplies high voltage to the spark plugs.

examples.translation: Check the resistance of the ignition coil.

examples.chinese: 发火线圈老化会导致点火不良
examples.translation: Aging of the ignition coil can lead to ignition failure.

examples.chinese: 更换发火线圈后故障消除
examples.translation: The fault was eliminated after replacing the ignition coil.
